data.title: UltraStar Open Discussion: 2 Player mode : howto
data.text:
Hi,

I have just downloaded ultrastar yesterday and it is wonderfull. Allready added 50 songs to it :-) Great work guys.

Now my question.

In ultrastar 0.4 there is an option to play with 2 (infact even 6 ???) players.

What are the options to make this work ?

- Having two soundcards with each a microphone on the microphone-jack ?

- Having the singstar mics with the USB splitter and put it in one USB port of the pc ?

I am pretty sure reading other messages those two options will work. But my final question is:

- Having two USB mics and put them each in their own USB slot. Will this work ?

And then I also have some questions about the singstar mics :

- Are they sold seperatly ?

- Is their quality much better then default pc microphones (like http://www.logitech.com/index.cfm/products/details/US/EN,CRID=103,CONTENTID=6776)

- I know they will work in ultrastar. But will the mic also work in the normal windows environment ? Can I use them with skype for example ?
